name: Copycat (itch) (DawCrash)
description:
A puzzle game where you have to copy the pattern in the least possible number of moves.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to start

Notes:

  • This is just a prototype to test the mechanics. I don't know if this will be interesting  enough to create a full game about it.
  • No frameworks or game engines were used. It's pure javascript

The game is open source. You can check the Github repo here:

https://github.com/eliseodb/CopycatGame
